Ella se dedica con mucha alegría y firmeza a la compraventa de ropa típica de diferentes estilos y precios. Ella vende su producto en la casa donde vive y también sale a otras comunidades cercanas. Esta actividad le gusta realizarla porque por medio de ella se relaciona con su comunidad y conoce a muchas personas; además de ello le genera los ingresos económicos necesarios para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia. Tiene muchos años de experiencia en esta actividad porque ella empezó a ejercerla desde muy joven aprendiendo de algunas amigas y de su familia.

 Ella solicita un segundo préstamo ya que a través de su primer préstamo se dio cuenta que pudo variar su negocio y le genero ganancias, La ropa típica cada día moderniza ella necesita hacer ahora una nueva inversión a su negocio para la compra de nuevos productos.   

Uno de sus principales sueños es que en un futuro sus ganancias incrementen para poder comprar terreno para sus hijos y luego construirles casa.
texts.en:
Bárbara is a very enthusiastic and kind woman who works hard every day to provide for her family, which is comprised of four children and her husband. She is 43 years old and married.

She is a joyful and persistent businesswoman who sells traditional clothes of different styles and prices. She sells her products at home, but she also visits the surrounding neighborhoods. She likes this activity because she connects with her community and meets many people. In addition, she earns enough to cover her family’s basic needs. She has been doing this for many years. She started working when she was very young, taught by some friends and relatives.

Bárbara is requesting her second loan after realizing that she could make good profits by diversifying her business. Traditional clothes are changing every day. She needs to invest now in her business by buying new products.

One of her biggest dreams is to increase her profits so that she can buy a piece of land for her children and build a house for them.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es: Ana tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 13 años y sus dos hijas de 17 años y 7 años de edad. Ana se gana la vida por medio de la venta de pescado y ropa desde hace 10 años. Este negocio es el que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y dar a su familia lo necesario. Ana desea reparar el techo del corredor de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar a su familia mayor seguridad.
texts.en: Ana is 34 years old and lives in her own house with her son of 13 and her two daughters aged 17 and 7. Ana has earned a living by way of selling fish and clothing for the past 10 years. This business is what allows her to carry sustenance to her home and give her family what's necessary. Ana wishes to repair the roof of the hallway of the home, which is why she is applying for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized roofing and wood. She hopes to be able to count on this loan and therefore give her family better security.

loans.use: to buy: galvanized roofing and wood to repair the hallway roof of the home.

loans.name: Miraflores De Bamby  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En un sitio llamado Higuerón en la ciudad de Portoviejo cada quince días se reúnen los socios  del Grupo De Crédito Miraflores De Bamby. Los mismos que se dedican a diversas actividades tales como la agricultura, comercio en general, entre otras actividades. Ellos al conocer de los beneficios que brinda la institución decidieron unirse  tiempo atrás para  poder acceder a los créditos que brinda La  Fundación Espoir.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Carmen, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de  esta  relación tienen dos hijos de  10 y 8 años que estudian en escuela. Su esposo es guardia de seguridad.
Doña Carmen es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto  ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos  Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale tres  o cuatro días a la semana de dos a tres horas por día, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de 5  años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se gana algo y que les sirve para salir adelante ya que su marido no gana mucho en su trabajo.	
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas y cosméticos. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho para su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
En a place called Higuerón in the city of Portoviejo every fifteen days, the members meet from the Miraflores de Bamby village bank. They work in diverse activities including agriculture, business in general, among other activities. Upon knowing the benefits that the institution offers, they decided to unify themselves some time ago to be able to access the loans that the Fundación Espoir provides.

One of the members of this group is Carmen. She is 36, married and from this relation they have two children, aged 10 and 8, who study in school. Her husband is a security guard.

Carmen is a housewife who works selling Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women's accessories) to obtain her own resources and with this, help her husband with the expenses of the home. Her form of sale is door to door. She leaves three or four days a week for two to three hours a day. She leaves her products on credit and collects every eight days. She has been working at this activity for more than five years, with which she earns something and serves them to get ahead since her husband doesn't earn much in his work.

This loan is to buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics. This is the third cycle in the village bank and she likes it because the loans help her a lot for her business. Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Paula Janet

texts.es:
Paula es una señora la cual tiene una relacion estable donde han procreado dos hijos a los que les brinda su apoyo para su desarrollo. Esta señora se desempeña como maestra de educacion secundaria desde hace 19 largos años, hoy en dia esta  señora tiene una gra necesidad de construir las paredes de su vivienda y le hace falta compra los ladrillos para construir dichas paredes.
por tal motivo  se acerco a ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento el que lo invertiria para la compra de ladrillos para cerrar su su vivienda  por medio de esta construccion tendria  seguridad , tranquilidad y mejores condiciones y nivel de vida en su seno familiar.
texts.en:
Paula is a woman in a stable relationship in which she has had two children, whose development she supports. She has worked as a high school teacher for 19 years. At the moment she greatly needs to build walls in her home and she needs to buy the bricks to build these walls.

For this reason she came to ceprodel to apply for a loan which she will invest in the purchase of bricks to close up her house, so that her building will be secure and quiet, and so that her family will have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials such as bricks, iron, and sand.

loans.name: Eberto Antonio

texts.es: Eberto es un hombre visionario preocupado por el desarrollo de su familia y de los niños a los que le brinda el pan de la enseñanza, ya que él es maestro de educación primaria con 14 años de ejercer dicha profesión, tiene un relación estable con 3 hijos  en edad escolar a los que le está brindando todo el apoyo , actualmente está presentando  unas necesidades que solo con ayuda del financiamiento  puede cubrir su necesidad como es reparar techo y paredes de su viviendo dicho financiamiento lo utilizaria para la compra de materiales tales como, zinc, cemento y arena los que le vendrian a mejorar sus condiciones de vida teniendo una vivienda digna de habitar con su familia ya que la tiene en mal estado.
texts.en: Eberto is a visionary man concerned about the development of his family and the children to whom he offers the bread of education, since he is a primary school teacher with 14 years of working in this profession. He has a stable relationship with 3 children of school age, to whom he is offering all his support. Currently, he has some needs that only with the help of a loan he will be able to meet, which is to repair the roof and walls of his house. This loan would be used to purchase materials such as zinc sheeting, cement and sand which would help to result in improving his living conditions, having a house worthy of living in with his family since the one he has is in bad condition.

loans.use: to repair the roof and walls of his house, he will purchase zinc sheeting, cement and sand.

loans.name: Olegario

texts.es:
Olegario tiene 51 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus 04 hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. Los habitantes de esta zona se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería, así como al comercio como actividades principales.

El se dedica a la cría y comercio de ganado caprino, cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en el rubro por lo cuál cuenta con bastante clientela, Olegario además se dedica a la agricultura, el tiene una pequeña finca de cacao en la cual toda su familia le ayuda en las labores agrícola. Tiene muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito es para invertir en el negocio comprando una mayor cantidad de ganado caprino así como alimento balanceado para engorde de estos, con esto Olegario espera implementar más su negocio y de esta manera poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Olegario is 51 year old, partnered, and lives with his partner and their 4 children in the district of Pomahuaca, Jaén province, Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. The inhabitants in this zone work in agriculture, animal husbandry and also commerce as their primary activities. 

He works raising and selling goats and has more than 15 years of experience in the field, so he has a fair customer base. Olegario also works in agriculture. He has a small cocoa farm where the whole family helps him with the farm work. He has very good personal and work references in the zone. The loan will be destined to invest in the business, buying a greater number of goats and also balanced feed to fatten them. With this, Olegario hopes to implement his business more and in this way be able to get an acceptable utility to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in his business, buying a greater number of goats and also balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Alnibal

texts.es:
Alnibal tiene 36 años de edad, es casado, vive con su cónyuge y sus 04 hijos en la provincia de Callayuc, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, las actividades económicas que se desarrollan principalmente son el comercio, ganadería y agricultura.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales como comerciales en su distrito. El préstamo estará destinado a la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con esto Alnibal espera mejorar la calidad de los productos que ofrecerá a sus clientes, lo que le reportará mayores niveles de ingresos y le permitirá aumentar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Alnibal is 36 years old, married, and lives with his spouse and their 4 children in the province of Callayuc, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in the district is peaceful and the principal economic activities are commerce, animal husbandry, and agriculture. 

He works growing coffee and has more than 10 years of experience in this field with very good personal references as a businessperson in the district. The loan will be used to purchase manure and fertilizers to take good care of his coffee crop. With this, Alnibal hopes to improve the quality of the products that he offers his customers, which will result in higher income levels and will permit him to increase his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers to take good care of his coffee crop.

loans.name: Juan Elvis Fernando

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre 36 años de edad, vive en la comunidad llamada Xejuyup, es un persona que le gusta trabajar y ama su trabajo.

Este abnegado señor se dedica a la compra y venta de Maxan (Envoltorio para conserva de alimentos) es un envoltorio muy utilizado en toda la época del año, lo utilizan para tamal de arroz, tamal de papa, también para envoltorio de queso y otros alimentos, este tipo de envoltorio se da más en los lugares donde el ambiente es cálido.

 Por lo mismo que es muy vendible, Juan no solo se dedica a la compra venta, el también  siembra Maxan, pero muy poco porque no cuenta con suficiente terreno. 

Juan previo a su primer préstamo en adicla, solo vendía al menudeo en el mercado local, pero con ese préstamo él ahora distribuye el maxan por mayor a otros revendedores, Juan vio que si le genero ganancias con ampliar la venta, Él necesita ahora un segundo préstamo para comprar mas maxan y poder distribuir a otros lugares aledaños, otro gran suelo de Juan es mejor sus terrenos de cultivos para que tenga más producción y quizás mas adelante con las ganancias pueda comprar mas terreno y seguir sembrando.
texts.en:
Juan is 36 years old and lives in the village of Xejuyup. He is hard-working and loves his line of work.
He is also a very selfless man. He buys and sells Maxan leaves, which are very widely used throughout the year to wrap all kinds of food: rice tamales, potato tamales, cheese, etc. It is very customary to use these leaves in places with a hot climate.
Since this product is such a staple, Juan not only buys and sells it, but also grows a few Maxan plants himself. However, his plot of land is very small, so he cannot sell only what he grows. 
This is Juan's second loan with field partner ADICLA. With the first, he managed to scale up his operations and went from selling leaves retail at the local market to selling wholesale to other retailers. He was very happy to see how much boosting his sales helped him increase his income. He now needs a second loan in order to buy more Maxan leaves and sell to other villages. Juan's other great dream is to improve his plot of land and see if he can find a way to increase his own production. His goal is to use part of his profits to buy more land and keep growing Maxan.

loans.use: to buy Maxan leaves to sell.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre que lucha cada día para llevar lo necesario a su familia, vive en una comunidad de Solola, de 49 años de edad. 

Este señor se dedica a la compra y venta de maíz, él tiene experiencia sobre este trabajo,  pero el problema que tenia era que no contaba con capital de trabajo, gracias a un préstamo que se dio en adicla pudo incrementar su venta, con  el poco capital que él contaba,  vendía alrededor de cuatro a cinco quintales, pero después del préstamo compra mas maíz y llegaba a vender hasta diez quintales, pero él no está convencido, con el avance que ha tenido, él está ahora buscando un segundo préstamo para comprar más maíz, tener su negocio cada día más grande con suficiente maíz para ofrecer a su clientela. 

Otro de los sueños de Francisco es generar ganancias cada día para que en corto tiempo pueda tener él su propio terreno para sembrar y ser algún día distribuidor de maíz.
texts.en:
Francisco, 49, is a man who fights every day to be able to provide for his family. He lives in a community called Solola.

This man buys and sells corn. He has experience, but the problem was that he did not have the working capital he needed. Thanks to a loan he received from ADICLA, he could buy more: before, he could only sell four or five quintals, but with the loan he bought more corn and was able to sell as much as ten quintals.

However, he is still not satisfied. Seeing how much he has progressed, he is requesting a second loan to buy more corn, expand his business more every day, and have enough corn to offer to his customers.

Francisco also dreams of making enough profits to be able to buy his own piece of land one day, so that he can grow corn and become a distributor.

loans.use: to buy corn to sell.

loans.name: El Arenal. Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario el Arenal está integrado por tres mujeres esforzadas en sus labores diarias que solicitan por tercera vez en ADIM el financiamiento para aumentar el capital de trabajo de sus negocios, quien lo coordina es la señora Marcia que tiene la edad de 31 años, casada y propietaria de una pulpería desde hace tres años, este negocio lo impulsó con ayuda financiera de su esposo y este crédito lo invertirá en la compra principalmente de granos básicos como es arroz, frijol, aceite, azúcar, cajas de jabón para lavar ropa, detergentes, etc., gracias a los financiamientos ha logrado aumentar y diversificar los productos que ofrece. E l resto de las integrantes son las señoras, María de 58 años de edad propietaria de un taller de costura desde hace treinta años en su domicilio, y Margarita quien tiene la edad de 28 años y es propietaria de un taller de carpintería en su domicilio desde hace cinco años.
texts.en:
The Arenal communal bank is made up of three women who make great efforts in their daily work, who are requesting their third loan with ADIM to increase the working capital of their businesses. Marcia is the coordinator and she is 31 years old, married and has been the owner of a grocery store for three years. She launched the business with the financial assistance of her husband and this loan will be used mainly to buy staples such as rice, beans, oil, sugar, boxes of laundry soap, detergents, etc. Thanks to the loans she has been able to increase and diversify the products that she offers.

The rest of the members are women, Maria, 58 years old, owner of a tailoring business for more than thirty years in her home, and Margarita who is 28 years old and has owned a furniture store in her home for the past 5 years

loans.use: to buy basic grains.

loans.name: Filiberto

texts.es:
Al entrar a la finca de don Filiberto, un sin número de repollos sembrados en filas, decoran el pequeño terreno que ha trabajado desde hace más de 30 años en la siembra de hortalizas, repollo y zanahoria. Este agricultor de 59 años, está casado y tiene dos hijos, uno de 8 y otro de 17 años de edad, que sirven de motivación para seguir dando pasos fuerte en su trabajo. 
Ahora que le fue tan bien con la siembra de repollo solicita un préstamo para comprar abonos y semillas de zanahoria, pues gracias a su esfuerzo y el apoyo de sus hijos, ha logrado comercializar su producto en el mercado local. Su meta es llegar a sembrar y a vender a nivel nacional, pues con ese dinero podrá cumplir su sueño de mejorar su vivienda, para tener una casa digna. Entre sus planes está conseguir más materiales para trabajar mejor su tierra.
texts.en:
Upon entering Filiberto's farm, there is myriad number of cabbages planted in rows. They decorate the small land that he's worked since more than 30 years ago, planting vegetables, cabbage and carrots. This farmer of 59 is married and has two children, one is 8 and the other 17 years old, who serve as the motivation to continue taking strong strides in his work.

Now that it went so well for him with the planting of the cabbage, he is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and carrot seeds. Thanks to his effort and the support of his children, he's achieved selling his product in the local market. His goal is to arrive to plant and sell at a national level. With this money he will be able to fulfill his dream of improving his home, to have a dignified house. Among his plans is to obtain more materials to work his land better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and carrot seeds.

loans.name: Moses

texts.es: Moses lives in Hoima Uganda. He is aged forty two married with six children and one attends school. He deals in spare parts for motorcycles and supplements his incomes by repairing motorcycles. He dreams of expanding and developing his business as well as paying school fees for his children in spite the hardship of high license fees. He will use the loan money to buy more sprockets for selling.
texts.en: Moses lives in Hoima Uganda. He is aged forty two married with six children and one attends school. He deals in spare parts for motorcycles and supplements his incomes by repairing motorcycles. He dreams of expanding and developing his business as well as paying school fees for his children in spite the hardship of high license fees. He will use the loan money to buy more sprockets for selling.

loans.use: to buy more sprockets for selling.

loans.name: Shirley Noemi

texts.es:
Shirley Noemi tiene 36 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con sus dos menores hijos en casa propia en el distrito de Zaña, ubicado en la provincia Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. Esta es una zona rural donde la vida es muy tranquila y armoniosa, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros, esta actividad la realiza en una tienda la cual se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio, cuenta con clientes fijos y con muy buenas referencias personales y comerciales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, gaseosas, entre otros para aumentar el stock de su tienda. De esta manera Shirley Noemi espera satisfacer los gustos y preferencias de sus clientes y así aumentar su nivel de ventas y tener mayores ingresos lo que mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Shirley Noemi is 36 years old and is a single mother who lives with her two youngest children in her own home in the district of Zaña, in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru. It is a rural area where life is tranquil and harmonious, and the inhabitants primarily work in agriculture, livestock and trade.

She makes a living selling groceries and basic products such as rice, sugar, oil, pasta, and other items. She has a store located in her home, and has regular customers and a good personal and commercial standing in the area.

She will use this loan to buy more products such as rice, sugar, and fizzy drinks to increase her store's stock. In this way, Shirley Noemi hopes to be able to satisfy the tastes and preferences of her customers in order to increase her sales, thus boosting her earnings which will, in turn, improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more products such as rice, sugar, and fizzy drinks to increase her store's stock.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, a sus 32 años viven junto a su único hijo y su pareja en la comunidad llamada Maxanijá

Este abnegado señor se dedica a la siembra de frijoles; esto lo realiza en la comunidad donde vive y también en otras comunidades aledañas; tiene mucha experiencia en esta labor, lo cual lo ha adquirido con el pasar del tiempo y de la enseñanza de sus padres; con este trabajo el genera ingresos que utiliza para el sostenimiento de su hermosa familia. Tiene 12 años de experiencia en lo que realiza.
 
Francisco  ama a su familia y desea darle lo mejor, es por ello que solicita un  segundo préstamo para invertir en la siembra y en la compra de insumos para el  frijol y la otra parte del préstamo lo utilizara también para los trabajos  de injerto de café, para generar más ingresos para su familia. 

Su mayor sueño es poner un negocio más  mejorar la calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco is a very responsible and hard-working person. He is 32 years old and lives with his only son and his partner in the Maxanijá area.

This selfless man works growing beans, which he does in the community he lives in as well as neighbouring communities. He has a lot of experience in this work, which he has acquired over time and from being taught by his parents. With this work he generates income which he uses to support his lovely family. He has 12 years of experience in what he does.
 
Francisco loves his family and wants to give them the best, which is why he is applying for a second loan to invest in supplies for his bean crops. He will also use part of the loan for coffee grafting work, to generate more income for his family. 

His biggest dream is to start another business to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Juan Matias

texts.es: El Sr. Juan tiene 44 años y es divorciado con 1 hijo que tiene la edad de 20 años, el sigue con la actividad de  la carpintería, el Sr. Juan es carpintero hace varios años esta actividad lo heredo de su padre quien era también carpintero, su taller se encuentran en la zona de Cobol,  de la ciudad de Cochabamba  este préstamo es su cuarta secuencia dentro de la institución, Juan vive en casa propia que cuenta con todos los servicios basicos, Juan utilizara este préstamo para la compra de madera ya que tiene mucho trabajo que realizar por estas fiestas de fin de año  razón  solicita este préstamo es por la gran demanda de roperos, Juan enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la gran competencia  y los  problemas sociales, y  utilizara los beneficios para incrementar su producción de muebles, su deseo para su negocio es tener una carpintería grande con muchos operarios.
texts.en: Juan is 44 years old and divorced with one son who is 20 years old. He continues working in carpentry. Juan has been a carpenter for a number of years, he inherited this work from his father who  was also a carpenter, and his shop is located in the Cobol zone, in the city of Cochabamba. This loan is his fourth loan cycle with the institution. Juan lives in his own house that has all the basic services. Juan will use this loan to purchase wood since he has a lot of work to do for the end of the year holidays. The reason he is asking for this loan is for the high demand for wardrobes. Juan has challenges in his business which are the high level of competition and the social problems. He will use the profit to increase his furniture production. His desire is to have a large carpentry shop with many employees.

loans.use: to purchase wood in bulk.

loans.name: Loma Chiquita Group

texts.es:
Anteriormente, en la comunidad donde se reunían los integrantes de "Loma Chiquita" se podía admirar una loma que ofrecía una vista magnífica cuando los primeros rayos del sol la iluminaban y de allí, tomaron el nombre de la asociación. 

Don José es una persona muy seria, tiene 55 años y nunca se casó. La mayor parte de su vida se ha dedicado al campo por lo que conoce muy bien el proceso para obtener el mejor maíz de la región. También se dedica a la cría y engorda de animales, actualmente tiene algunos cerdos los cuales están creciendo muy rápido. Su negocio más importante es una tienda de abarrotes que abrió hace seis años con un pequeño ahorro de $8,000 pesos (550 USD) con lo que pudo comprar detergentes, aceites, refrescos, productos enlatados, etc. Entonces no tenía anaqueles así que colocó algunas cajas pequeñas y una mesa para acomodar su poca mercancía. José adquiere su mercancía en el centro del municipio y viaja en su camioneta para transportarla toda ya que siempre procura comprar todo tipo de productos para que sus clientes encuentren rápidamente todo lo necesario y ellos no tengan que viajar hasta el municipio o comprar en otro establecimiento. Este esfuerzo le ha ganado a don José la preferencia de sus clientes quienes están satisfechos con el servicio. La única dificultad que enfrenta por el momento es la falta de un refrigerador más grande para poder colocar más artículos. Con el nuevo préstamo comprará  dulces, botanas, refrescos, productos lácteos, productos enlatados para abastecer la tienda. 

“Con las ganancias de la tienda pude hacer crecer el número de los cerdos, he llegado a tener 30 y cuando los vendo también son muy buenas ganancias”. José tiene planeado construir una bodega para almacenar el alimento de sus animales, por el momento únicamente utilizará algunas láminas de acero, sin embargo espera reunir todo el capital necesario con las ganancias de la tienda y también le encantaría construir otros corrales para comprar más cerditos. Su sueño es establilizar ambos negocios para dejar de solicitar préstamos en un futuro.

Los integrantes del grupo y Don José están muy agradecidos con VisionFund y KIVA por el apoyo recibido porque poco a poco han mejorado sus negocios. Catalina e Isidra invertirán en dulces y refrescos y María de la Luz invertirá en una pequeña tienda de abarrotes.

*La foto fue tomada en la tienda de abarrotes de Don José*
texts.en:
Previously, in the community where the Loma Chiquita [Little Hill] group members met, you could admire the magnificent first rays of sunlight from a hill with a view, and from that they named their communal bank.

Jose is a very serious person, he is 55 years old and never married. Most of his life has been dedicated to the countryside so he really knows how to grow the region's best corn. He also raises and fattens animals. Currently he has some pigs which are growing fast. His most important business is a grocery store which he opened six years ago with a small saving of 8,000 pesos ($550 US) with which he could buy detergents, oils, drinks, canned goods, etc. At that time he didn't have any shelves so he put some boxes and a table out to accommodate his little merchandise. 

Jose gets his merchandise in the town centre and travels by pickup to transport it all, as he always buys all sorts of products so his clients can quickly find everything they need and they don't have to travel into town or shop at another establishment. This effort has made Jose his customers' choice and they are satisfied with his service. The only difficulty he faces at the moment is the lack of a bigger refrigerator where he can keep more products. With the new loan he will buy sweets, snacks, soft drinks, dairy products, canned goods, etc.

"With the profits from the store I could raise my numbers of pigs, I've got 30 now and when I sell them there will be good profits.". Jose plans to build a hold to store animal feed, at the moment he just uses a few sheets of metal, nevertheless he hopes to get the necessary funds for it from the shop and he would also like to build more pens to buy more pigs. His dream is to establish both businesses in order to stop requesting loans in the future.

The members of the group and Jose are very grateful to VisionFund and KIVA for the support received because bit by bit, they have improved their businesses. Catalina and Isidra will purchase sweets and drinks and Maria de la Luis will purchase a small grocery store.

*This photo was taken in Jose's grocery store.

loans.use: to buy sweets, snacks, soft drinks, dairy products, canned goods, etc.

location.town: Tres Estrellas, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 61 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Erlinda is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. Erlinda has been farming sugarcane for 15 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Dúo Los Pedregales Group

texts.es: Dúo Los Pedregales, este dúo esta conformado por la señora Maria de 61 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de talamales desde hace varios años,esta muy agradecida con Kiva es una institucion que le ha apoyado en gran manera en su negocio, en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles para la elaboracion de tamales, sus clientes le han echo pedidos para la epoca navideña y nececita capital para invertir.
texts.en:
"Los Pedregales" Duo

This duo has 61-year-old María as one of its members. She has been making a living producing and selling tamales for a number of years. She is very grateful to Kiva, which has been a great support for her business. On this occasion María is applying for a loan in order to buy edible products to make tamales to sell. María's customers have made orders for Christmas and María needs capital to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy edible products to make tamales to sell.

loans.name: Las Pankaritas" Group

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer de 30 años de edad, casada, tiene un hijo varón de 6 años, y su negocio es el tejido de busos y chompas para adultos y niños.
Ella es emprendedora, alegre, optimista, feliz, de buena actitud, responsable y comprometida con su trabajo. Su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante en la zona ‘cosmos 79’ caracterizada por albergar al estadio del mismo nombre, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-12 grados centígrados y a una altura aproximada de 3800 metros sobre el nivel de mar.
Carmen es de tez morena, cabello negro largo trenzado, baja estatura, ojos obscuros, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (la 2 de la derecha, usa chompa roja). Su vida la realiza con su esposo que se dedica al comercio, y con su hijo que esta comenzando a estudiar en la escuela, viven en una casa alquilada que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, alcantarillado y gas. Las ganas de mejorar su negocio la llevaron a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de flores, servicio de té, taller de costura, venta de productos cosméticos, elaboración de colchones,  venta de chamarras y venta de mandiles,  para solicita un préstamo y continuar con sus actividades. Su negocio es el tejido y venta de busos (pantalones) y chompas para niños y adultos. Su labor consiste en tejer a mano pantalones y chompas de diferentes tallas y colores para luego realizar la venta. El tejido lo realiza a diario, mientras se encuentra en su puesto de venta. Su forma de vender es ambulante en ferias y comercios, ella se ubica en algún comercio y mientras expone las prendas se dedica a tejer. “el comercio de prendas de lana tiene gran demanda, debido a que el clima del lugar, obliga a los clientes a abrigarse…” comenta. Su sueño es tener una casa propia. Ella desea realizar una inversión en su negocio mediante la compra de lana por mayor, para abaratar gastos y abastecerse de prendas para ofertar sus clientes. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Carmen solicita un préstamo para la compra de lana por mayor para tejer y ofertar variedad de prendas en diseños y colores.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 30-year-old woman, married, who has a 6-year-old son. Her business is weaving busos (pants) and sweaters for adults and children.

She is an enterprising, happy, optimistic, cheerful, positive, responsible person dedicated to her work. She carries out her business as a street vendor in the Cosmos 79 zone, characterized by having the stadium of the same name, in a cold and dry climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 2-12 degrees centigrade and an altitude of approximately 3800 meters above sea level. 

Carmen is olive-skinned, has long braided black hair, is short, has dark eyes, her native language is Aymará and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for the business she does (she is the second from the right, wearing a read sweater). She has her life with her husband, who works in trade, and her child who is starting to go to school. They live in a rented house that has drinking water, electricity, sewer and gas services. Her desire to improve her business led her to form a communal bank of people with businesses such as flower sales, tea service, tailoring shop, cosmetics sales, cushion making, jacket sales, and apron sales, to ask for a loan and continue with their work. Her business is weaving and selling busos (pants) and sweaters for children and adults. Her work consists of hand weaving the pants and sweaters in different sizes and colors to later sell them. She does the weaving daily, while she is in her sales point. She sells as a street vendor in the fairs and shops, she is located in a shop and while she shows the articles, she works weaving. "The sale of woolen products has a high demand due to the place's climate, it makes the customers dress warmly..." she says. Her dream is to have her own house. She wants to invest in her business by purchasing wool in bulk to reduce her expenses and supply herself with articles to offer her customers. This is her second loan cycle with the institution in the 4 years that she has been doing this work.
 
It is for these reasons that Carmen asks for a loan to purchase wool in bulk to weave and offer a variety of clothing designs and colors.

loans.use: to purchase wool in bulk to weave and offer a variety of articles in design and color.

loans.name: Celita

texts.es: Doña Celita, tiene 52 años de edad, es soltera por viudez y tiene a su cargo 4 hijos con quienes vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Puerto, Cortes. Hace mas de 9 años que decidió tener su propia fuente de ingresos para sostener a su familia y se ha dedicado a elaborar y vender tamalitos de elote, tamales de harina de maíz con carne y elotes cocidos de maíz . Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y lo ha mantenido estable mediante la inversión de varios prestamos. Actualmente solicita otro préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para comprar la materia prima como ser el elote de maíz, manteca, azúcar, y otros para la elaboración de tamalitos y venta de elotes. Su Plan es crecer en clientes y ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Celita is 52 years old and a widow. She has four children with whom she lives in a village in the municipality of Puerto Cortes. Nine years ago she decided to create her own source of income to support her family. She makes a living making and selling sweetcorn tamales, maize tamales with meat, and cooked corn on the cob. 

Her business is located in her house and she has been able to keep it running smoothly with the help of various loans. Now she is asking for another loan of 10,000 Lempiras in order to buy the basic ingredients, such as sweetcorn, lard, sugar, etc. needed to make tamales and corn on the cob. Her plan is to improve her customer base and help her children.

loans.use: to buy basic ingredients such as sweetcorn, lard, sugar, etc. in order to make tamales and corn on the cob.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Diosdada

texts.en:
Diosdada works hard to support her family. She is a widow and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Diosdada requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business. She has been in this business for six years.

In the future, Diosdada would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business

loans.name: Safina

texts.en:
Safina is 28 years old. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of two children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been running an auto rickshaw for the last few years. 

For many days his rickshaw has not worked properly from the wear and tear of regular uses. He feels that most of the parts he needs to repair it are not available so he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to buy a new auto rickshaw. However due to the lack of money he finds it difficult to cover the cost of new rickshaw. 

Therefore Safina has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Safina is so thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband.
